According to all the known laws of aviation, there is no way that the [color=#FFCC00]bumblebee[/color] should be able to fly. The [color=#FFCC00]bumblebee[/color], of course, flies anyways, because [color=#FFCC00]bumblebees[/color] don't care what humans think is impossible.
